name: Twotris
description:
This game is made for United Game Jam 2020.

Have you ever wondered what it would be like if two tetrominoes drop at the same time? Well, it's happening right now!

We've made some changes to Tetris's rules -- when you use the arrow keys to move or rotate, both Tetrominoes make the same action at the same time. Considering this might make it a bit difficult, we added some new tetrominoes and an incredible surprise. 

In the context of World War TWO, you have to endlessly stack fallen cargo boxes to provide more resources for Stalingrad's defense! Please pay attention to bombs that fall from the sky; they may also bring benefits. For the victory of the Soviets!
